articles.title: Romantic moment man proposes to his girlfriend with a flash mob - Daily Mail
articles.description: Craig Calvert, 33, proposed to Natalie Hunt, 32, with the help of Apollo Theatre Arts School in Brighton. After the huge flash mob, he asked his shocked girlfriend to marry him.
articles.content:
This is the romantic moment a man proposed to his girlfriend of nine years with a flash mob dance.
